The State of Museum Digital Practice | 2023 : A collection of graduate essays

Contributors: Museums and Technology | George Washington University

This publication was created by students in the fall 2023 Museums and Technology course at George Washington University. It is the fourth iteration of this project, which sees graduate students grappling with the implications of digital technologies for museums.

Cover image created using AI-image generator CrAIyon using the prompt “an interior scene of a virtual museum, with a dinosaur skeleton, art, and historical artifacts.”
